member.name: P:DartSassHost.CompilationOptions.Charset
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to emit a @charset or BOM for CSS with non-ASCII characters

member.summary: Gets or sets a list of paths that library can look in to attempt to resolve <с>@import</с> declarations

remarks.para: When using method, it is recommended that use this property.

member.summary: Gets or sets a indent type

member.summary: Gets or sets a line feed type

member.name: P:DartSassHost.CompilationOptions.OmitSourceMapUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to disable <с>sourceMappingUrl</с> in css output

member.name: P:DartSassHost.CompilationOptions.OutputStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a output style for the generated css code

member.name: P:DartSassHost.CompilationOptions.QuietDependencies
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to silence compiler warnings from stylesheets loaded by using the property

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to enable source map generation

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to include contents in maps

member.name: P:DartSassHost.CompilationOptions.SourceMapRootPath

member.summary: Gets a character at the specified index from the string. A return value indicates whether the receiving succeeded.
member.param: The zero-based index of the character

member.returns: true if the character was received successfully; otherwise, false
